def main():
    t = input()
    for i in xrange(t):
        a, b, n = map(int, raw_input().split())
        # Testing a naive approach.
        if n==1: print a
        elif n==2: print b
        else:
            for i in xrange(2,n):
                c = a+b
                a = b
                b = c
            print c
main()

# For Complexity log n use the Matrix Exponentiation Method.
